analysis.description:
Contract locking ether found in /unique_chucks/13/0xa3e257fbdd822eb3af3912d127024192f6ae1708.sol:
	Contract TBTCToken has payable functions:
	 - fallback (/unique_chucks/13/0xa3e257fbdd822eb3af3912d127024192f6ae1708.sol#356-358)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether
Parameter '_newOwner' of Owned.transferOwnership (/unique_chucks/13/0xa3e257fbdd822eb3af3912d127024192f6ae1708.sol#144) is not in mixedCase
